thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant
thread.title_full: Brilliant - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: christinemcqueen1988
title: Brilliant
text: This hotel is first class. From the moment we stepped foot inside we were greeted by the Bowie mural taken from the mural just around the corner. As a big David Bowie fan this made my trip. The staff are amazing, they are warm and friendly and nothing is too much trouble for them. The hotel room was spotless. Big thank you to all the staff who work there. They are a credit to the place.
